tutorials.title: Welcome to Eclipse Market Pro
tutorials.description: Learn the basics and get started with your trading journey.

steps.title: Welcome
steps.content: Eclipse Market Pro is your comprehensive crypto trading and analytics platform. Let's take a quick tour!

steps.title: Connect Your Wallet
steps.content: Connect your Solana wallet to start trading and tracking your portfolio.

steps.title: Explore Features
steps.content: Navigate between Dashboard, Coins, Trading, and Portfolio pages using the sidebar.

steps.title: Command Palette
steps.content: Press Ctrl+K (or Cmd+K on Mac) to open the command palette for quick navigation and actions.

steps.title: Get Help Anytime
steps.content: Click the help button on any page to access documentation, tutorials, and the changelog.

tutorials.title: Trading Basics
tutorials.description: Learn how to place your first trade and manage orders.

steps.title: Order Ticket
steps.content: Start by selecting your trading pair and entering order details.

steps.title: Order Types
steps.content: Choose between Market (immediate execution), Limit (specific price), or Stop orders.

steps.title: Paper Trading Mode
steps.content: Practice with virtual money! Toggle Paper Mode in Settings â†’ Trading Execution.
points: Switch to live trading when ready

steps.title: View Orders
steps.content: Monitor your open orders and trade history in the orders panel.

tutorials.title: Portfolio Analysis
tutorials.description: Understand your positions, risk, and performance metrics.

steps.title: Portfolio Overview
steps.content: View your total balance, P&L, and asset allocation at a glance.

steps.title: Risk Analysis
steps.content: ML-powered risk scoring helps identify portfolio vulnerabilities.

steps.title: Performance Charts
steps.content: Track your portfolio value over time with detailed performance charts.

tutorials.title: Setting Up Alerts
tutorials.description: Configure price, volume, and anomaly alerts to stay informed.

steps.title: Alert Types
steps.content: Create alerts for price thresholds, volume spikes, or market anomalies.
points: Price alerts: Get notified at specific price levels
Volume alerts: Track unusual trading activity

steps.title: Create Your First Alert
steps.content: Click the bell icon and select 'Create Alert' to get started.

steps.title: Alert Delivery
steps.content: Receive alerts via in-app notifications, email, Telegram, or webhooks.
